name: Nycto (panpan58, Pedro Coutinho, Miguel Martinho, killereks)
name_original: Nycto (panpan58, Pedro Coutinho, Miguel Martinho, killereks)
description:
If you get stuck don't hesitate to use cheats!

Nycto is a first-person survival horror puzzle game. 

Shoot to see your surroundings

Fight enemies

Destroyable environment

You are trapped in deep caves with no lights.  Thankfully you found a gun that allows you to see briefly whenever you shoot. Risk yourself deeper in search of an exit, battle ancient monsters and solve riddles that survived ages.

killereks, Miguel Martinho, Pedro Coutinho, panpan58
